programme.title: Kisaan
programme.desc: The story of a farmer, Maan Singh, who struggles to save his ancestral land from corrupt officials and greedy businessmen. With the help of his son, he fights against the system and stands up for his rights as a farmer. The movie highlights the challenges faced by farmers in modern India and explores themes of family, tradition, and social justice in a poignant and inspiring plot.

programme.title: Krantiveer
programme.desc: Disowned by his parents at a young age, a man ends up in a small village controlled by underworld dons and powerful politicians. Lazy, alcoholic, and unemployed, he gets influenced by a journalist with a positive mission.

programme.title: Mangal Pandey (the Rising)
programme.desc: It is the year 1857. The British are plundering the resources of their Indian subjects, who have reached their breaking point. Soldier Mangal Pandey (Aamir Khan) leads an uprising against India's imperialist occupiers -- events the British call a mutiny and the Indians call a war for independence. Throughout the violent events, Mangal maintains a friendship with Capt. William Gordon (Toby Stephens), who sympathizes with India's subjugated citizens and obeys his conscience.

programme.title: Kuch Toh Hai
programme.desc: The movie follows the story of a young couple who move into a new house, only to discover that it is haunted by a mysterious presence. As they try to unravel the truth behind the entity, they uncover a dark secret that threatens their very existence.

programme.title: Maine Pyar Kyon Kiya
programme.desc: A romantic comedy about a man named Samir who lies about being married to avoid the advances of his co-worker, Sonia. When Sonia finds out the truth, she starts dating Samir's friend Vicky. As Samir tries to win back Sonia's love, he faces humorous misunderstandings and complicated love triangles.

programme.title: Gali Gali Chor Hai
programme.desc: Bharat, a small-time artist, finds himself dealing with the effects of a corrupt system. In the process, he himself discovers his ideals and decides to fight for the rights of the common people.

programme.title: Gumnaam The Mystery
programme.desc: An aspiring actress, Ria who models and acts in music videos is offered a lead role in a film by casting director Rishi Gandhi. However, when she arrives at the director's mansion, she begins to realise that things are not as they seem.

programme.title: Koi Aap Sa
programme.desc: A film that centers around a young man who develops feelings for his childhood friend, who is already in a committed relationship. As he tries to move on, he falls in love with another woman. However, things become complicated when his childhood friend realizes her own feelings for him.

programme.desc: Friends Rajiv and Amar go their separate ways after Seema decides to be with Amar rather than Rajiv. Years later, prosecution lawyer Amar is delighted to see Rajiv in court and accused of murder.

programme.desc: JB, a borderline psychopath, is attracted to Lalita, a beautiful, young woman. He forces her to marry him but she runs away on her wedding day by feigning unconsciousness.

programme.title: Love Range
programme.desc: In the bustling metro city of Mumbai, Ayush and Roohi's lives are turned upside down by the COVID-19 pandemic. When Ayush loses his job, Roohi decides to start a tiffin service to support the family, but Raj's traditional views and wounded ego create tension as he struggles with the idea of his wife being the breadwinner.

programme.title: Cycle Of Sorrows
programme.desc: Set in a rural village, this heart-wrenching story follows a poor father with a beloved daughter, who still yearns for a son as his pregnant wife prepares to give birth. Driven by financial hardship, he makes a tragic decision that not only shatters his family but leaves his relationship with his daughter and wife forever scarred. Watch this emotional tale of a fatherâs regret and the lasting impact on his family. Can he undo the damage heâs caused?

programme.title: On The Spot
programme.desc: On a fateful day, Parul hails a taxi to visit her boyfriend Ansh. Ansh, eagerly anticipating her arrival, is thrown into restlessness. However, their journey takes an unexpected turn when the taxi driver receives news of his daughter falling ill. Witnessing this, Parul's compassionate response sparks anger in Ansh. Yet, in the face of adversity, Parul's decision unfolds, offering inspiration to the youth. This is the tale of "On the Spot."

programme.title: Ransom Handsome
programme.desc: Ayan and Kabir are small time criminals involved in the kidnapping of a daughter of a dangerous mob boss, Nicole. All they have to do is stick to a kidnapping checklist and check off items as they come to pass. But their novice actions force them to interact with Nicole. Her innocent interactions result in a significantly jacked up ransom amount. Nicole manipulates the situation. Ayan and Kabir struggle to survive as Nicole starts executing her master plan to leave no witnesses behind

programme.title: Pardesi Love
programme.desc: The central theme of "Pardesi Love" focuses on a romance involving an Indian taxi driver and a foreign woman who arrives in India from Canada to meet her online boyfriend and fulfill her mother's final rites. However, the situation is far from straightforward. Jasmin intends to wed her boyfriend, Sunny, and establish a life in India, while simultaneously, the cab driver, Satya, develops feelings for her. Yet, the complexities of their relationships and interactions form the crux of the film's narrative, showcasing the dynamic among these three individuals.

programme.title: Nazariyaa
programme.desc: Mihika, a 22 year old, fights with her dad yet again over going out late at night. She finds it very unreasonable of him to be so worried now that sheâs 22. Waiting for her cab, she overhears her buildingâs supervisor talking on a phone call with his own daughter. She steps in and debates with him about how he shouldnât be upset about her being out late at night but understands his perspective too in the process. She then goes back home to apologise and reconcile with her dad. The supervisor also understands his daughterâs situation better through this chance encounter.

programme.title: Ansh
programme.desc: When Nidhi visits an orphanage with hopes of adopting, she is confronted by the unresolved trauma of losing her own child to kidnapping. As she battles grief and depression, she must find a way to heal and embrace life again. A poignant tale of loss, resilience, and the power of hope.

programme.title: Share Baazaar
programme.desc: A satirical mockumentary that dives into the wild world of stock markets, where retail traders chase dreams, operators outsmart the game, and finfluencers sell hope (and courses). SHARE BAZAAR: Yahaan Sabhi Gyaani Hain is a sharp, hilarious take on the madness behind the money.

programme.title: The Moment
programme.desc: One evening, Dhirendra (40 yrs.) is eager to head home, yet the taxi driver is awaiting additional passengers. Eventually, a lone passenger arrives, prompting the taxi to proceed. As the driver requests fares and mentions a lack of change, a comedic spectacle ensues between the passengers and the driver. Ultimately, the narrative takes a humorous twist, concluding with a happy ending.

programme.title: Khwahishon Ki Car
programme.desc: A newlywed longs to drive her dowry car, but is stalled by her husband's ego and her mother-in-lawâs control. The Driverâs Seat is a quiet rebellion about agency, freedom, and the fight to take controlâon the road and in life.

programme.title: 23 B Raheja
programme.desc: 23B Raheja is a gripping one-night drama that peels back the glossy layers of the entertainment industry to expose the shadows lurking beneath. The story revolves around a celebrated casting director whose charm masks a long trail of manipulation and exploitation. His power begins to crumble when a young woman arrives at his door, posing as an aspiring actressâbut with a haunting connection to his past. As the night unfolds, so does a tense game of revelations, where truth becomes confrontation and justice takes an unexpected form. Taut, timely, and unsettlingly real, 23B Raheja is not just a story of reckoningâitâs a mirror held up to the systems we too often ignore.

programme.title: Ghar
programme.desc: Isaac, a 15-year-old boy, is trapped in the trauma of his parents' separation, leading him to lose his passion for music. His grandmother advises him to revisit his passion and meet Naomi, a retired singer. How he finds beauty in his brokenness, follows the crux of the story.

programme.title: Barking Bruno
programme.desc: Barking Bruno sheds light on the reality of modern life, where we often prefer pets over parents, viewing them as burdens. Rohit, content with his dog Bruno, contrasts sharply with his treatment of his father, Mr. Mehra, who feels neglected. However, when Mr. Mehra meets Bruno, his life takes an unexpected turn, albeit temporarily

programme.title: Rishtey
programme.desc: Ria, a rising model, and Juhi, a top creative director, share an unbreakable bondâuntil ace photographer Vicky enters their lives. As passion and ambition collide, their friendship is put to the ultimate test.

programme.title: Gunjaaish
programme.desc: A heartfelt journey of a couple raising a child with autism, discovering the power of love, resilience, and community. Featuring autistic actors, this ground breaking film celebrates acceptance and the beauty of being different.

programme.title: Pendulum
programme.desc: After losing his fiancÃ©e, Vishu is drowning in grief, unable to see a way forward. On the verge of giving up, a mysterious encounter changes everything, offering him a new perspective on life. Will he embrace the second chance fate has given him?

programme.title: Hum Types
programme.desc: Charu, a girl from high society, faces her own struggles. One night, she meets Makrand, a boy from a low social class. Initially, their class difference creates a barrier, but as they spend time together, Charu realizes they share more similarities than differences. Through moments of vulnerability and connection, they discover their common humanity.

programme.title: Blame Game
programme.desc: A woman sits alone on a beach, lost in thought, until a stranger joins her, sparking a conversation that reveals a story about love, relationships, and the bitterness they can sometimes bring. She describes a once-loving bond that, over time, turned painful, leaving lasting scars.

programme.title: Passbook
programme.desc: Set in the 90's when ATM and instant money transfer were still many years far away. In order to withdraw money people had to rely on a lengthy process of MT or Money Transfer which contained a bank to bank secret code.

programme.title: L'idiot
programme.desc: LâIdiot tells the story of Rinku, a young, eccentric man who is captivated by French culture and hopelessly infatuated with Mona, a charismatic and free-spirited girl in his language class. His romantic fantasies and attempts to impress Mona take a comedic yet dark twist when he encounters a mysterious âthief,â who manipulates Rinku into a dubious scheme to win Monaâs affection. Rinkuâs innocent longing for friendship and love leads him into an awkward and ultimately dangerous pursuit.

programme.title: The Perception
programme.desc: This story follows the journey of a professional photographer and a poor cycle rickshaw driver in Mumbai at the end of spring. Through various incidents on the road, their perceptions of each other change, highlighting the contrast between their social statuses. Ultimately, their experiences weave together to create a beautiful narrative of understanding and connection.

programme.title: Fried
programme.desc: In Mumbai, newlyweds Tanya and Rajat struggle after she loses her job. As financial strain and depression take a toll, their love is tested. An emotional journey of resilience, love, and the hidden impact of corporate layoffs on relationships.

programme.title: Writer
programme.desc: A quiet evening between a writer and his wife unravels into a surreal exploration of love, memory, and hidden truths. As reality shifts, so do the stories theyâve been telling themselvesâand each other.

programme.title: Khayaal Rakhna
programme.desc: A senior woman grapples with dementia, compelling her husband to confront challenging choices.

programme.title: Akhiri Parchi
programme.desc: This movie serves as an inspirational tool for kids, helping them grasp the extent of their parents' sacrifices and efforts to ensure their lives are comfortable and fulfilling, despite challenging circumstances. It aims to convey a powerful message, encouraging children to maximize their available resources and strive for their best.

programme.title: Suta
programme.desc: Suta (The Daughter) is the story of a bold and smart daughter who fights for the sacrifices of her mother which went unnoticed in the family. She emerges victorious and sees that her mother gains back her confidence.

programme.title: Ahsaas
programme.desc: Ahsaas is the emotional journey of Sana, a devoted wife caught in societyâs definition of a âcomplete woman.â As childlessness becomes a burden, her husbandâs support becomes her strengthâleading them to seek help and reclaim their peace, together.

programme.title: Laali (bahaar Part 02)
programme.desc: Bahaar is a haunting tale of a young bride crushed under the weight of infertility and expectations. Once cherished, sheâs slowly erasedâuntil the family finds a âsolution.â A heart breaking reflection on womanhood, shame, and broken promises.

programme.title: Sita Ram Chaddha
programme.desc: Sita Ram Chaddha's married daughter has the option to seek substantial financial assistance from her affluent brother, but her unique request ends up transforming the lives of everyone involved in unexpected and remarkable ways.

programme.title: Bahaar
programme.desc: Bahaar follows a young womanâs silent suffering inside a marriage built on expectations. Her dreams fade as sheâs shamed for infertilityâuntil the family finds a âsolution.â A haunting story of societal pressure, dignity, and the myth of the perfect marriage.

programme.title: Leaf
programme.desc: Raj and Neha, a newly married couple, move into a new house and soon begin sensing an eerie presence. Over time, they discover that the house is connected to their past lives, where they were caught in a karmic cycle of falling in love.

programme.title: Woh Khaas
programme.desc: A business tycoon bored with his monotonous work-life escapes from his corporate setup for a day and ends up meeting a girl, who like a dream changes him upside down in a real âFilmy Mannerâ. Woh Khaas is a jazzy tribute to Bollywood romances that tries to combine the reality of love and the flamboyance of Indian cinema in an entertaining and enriching way.

programme.title: Rangdari
programme.desc: An interrogation between a cop and a criminal turns into a pre-planned crime.

programme.title: Catharsis
programme.desc: A poignant journey of a man forced onto a path of self-discovery, exploring the depths of the human mind and spirit.

programme.title: Vansh
programme.desc: Dive into the powerful narrative of Vansh, a heartfelt short film from Vidyarthi Studios & Pocket Films, that explores the societal pressures surrounding gender expectations. This gripping tale follows a father's fierce desire for a son over his beloved daughter, shedding light on deep-seated beliefs and cultural traditions. As he grapples with his emotions, this poignant story opens a discussion about love, acceptance, and true parenthood. Donât miss this eye-opening film that promises to challenge perceptions and evoke empathy.

programme.title: Uljhan
programme.desc: After an unresolved breakup, Kartik and Ishita reunite for one last conversation. As memories resurface, so do the feelings. But closure doesnât always mean getting back together. Uljhan is a tender tale of emotional maturity, heartbreak, and growth.

programme.title: Broken Stars
programme.desc: An astrologer who has a fake beard is just like his profession. He is confused about the stars and how it determines anyone's future, he tricks people daily but He is worried about his daughter suffering from a disease, then one day as it happens his past somehow connects with his present which determines his future. it is a philosophical journey of a man who constantly questions the existence of sheer weirdness of the whole connection of our stars with lives and his realization

programme.title: Harela
programme.desc: A 60-year-old woman and a young man navigate tradition and modernity during the festival in Uttarakhand. Who will uphold their heritage in an evolving world?

programme.title: Raah
programme.desc: Raah is an exploration of the several stages of struggle when one steps out to pursue a dream. Sahir lives in Mumbai city with his family. The emotional and poetic narrative explores his faith, kinship and his struggle to establish himself as a poet/writer.

programme.title: The Last Date
programme.desc: A story of a husband and wife who are enjoying a romantic dinner date together that ends with a tragic climax.

programme.title: Bepar
programme.desc: A flourishing young Indian immigrant, happily married to a caring Pakistani husband, appears to lead a flawless life. However, the challenges of being in an interfaith marriage and adjusting to a foreign society might prove overwhelming.

programme.title: Taashe
programme.desc: Shiv Kothari, a village boy of 8 years is not at all interested to learn taashe (a musical instrument ), his family, and his ancestral business. What changes him so suddenly that he becomes keen to learn taashe. Who changes him so much that he decides to play taashe professionally. Watch a unique love and marriage story of two kids

programme.title: Expectations
programme.desc: The story is about a boy grappling with overwhelming feelings and contemplating drastic measures. This growing issue among the younger generation stems from unfulfilled expectations placed by society. 'Expectations' is a short film exploring the theme of emotional struggles and their severe consequences.

programme.title: Uyire
programme.desc: 'Uyire' explores the feeling of Love & how differently it is perceived from its actual implied meaning, whilst being a social commentary on the class system that is habitually rooted in Urban cities. Indrajit & Zoya, two contrasting individuals try to find a space where both of them feel respected. The film explores how an individual's upbringing, background, class, responsibilities, shapes their mindset, which ultimately leave Indrajit & Zoya at a stage of uncertainty.

programme.title: 2 Square
programme.desc: Nikhil comes early after work, and his wife runs to the bedroom where a man is hiding under the bed. She tries to indulge in small talks with Nikhil only to distract him so that her boyfriend can run away. What happens at the end is hilarious.

programme.title: Girgit
programme.desc: The film is an adaptation of Anton Chekhov's short story Chameleon. It tells a cheeky tale of injustice and corruption exposing the insincerity of public officials and selfish interests that aggravate or subdue their actions.

programme.title: Housewarming
programme.desc: A short film signifying how the energies we invite into our house affect us.

programme.title: Inphlembul
programme.desc: When two shady transport guys bicker over how dangerous their delivery consignment could be, they end up challenging each otherâs a logic, knowledge, and sense of culture and language.

programme.title: Jale Tere Honth
programme.desc: A young couple on their first date with the excitement of their first kiss does not find a private moment in the crowded city of Mumbai. Do they finally manage to experience that magical moment?

programme.title: Haseen Rahasya
programme.desc: Raj, an AI engineer, has built an AI house operator Jyoti. Raj goes on a date with Sara. Sara, a chemistry teacher already having the experience of real- world experience, is icing on the cake. Everything goes smoothly. But the fun turns into fear when Jyoti says "Run to save yourself". Sara's talk with Jyoti turns the fairytale into a nightmare. What will Sara do to save her life?

programme.title: Hey Listen!
programme.desc: After a few years of their breakup, Dhruv and Vidya finally got in touch with each other and decide to meet at the same place they used to hang out. All the memories were flashed, which lead them into a huge fight mixed with a lot of emotions that were buried within them years ago, and follows into an open end to the story.

programme.title: Holding Back
programme.desc: Short Film Holding back a short film is based on a true incident in 1999, of Shiva, a young man suffering from blood cancer and who, unfortunately, passed away during the journey while traveling by train from Bangalore to Chennai, for a friendâs marriage. Shiva was traveling with his mom and elder cousin Suresh. This film deals with the motherâs emotional journey of her sonâs death. The pivotal character- Mother, is played by the national award winner Seema Biswas, popularly known for her role in and as the Bandit Queen; while Father is played by national award-winning director-writer Ananth Mahadevan; Coolie is played by Aditya Lakhia (Kachra) of Lagaan fame; Cousin brother is played by Raj Arjun, main lead in Shabri and Kaalo, Shiva, the son is played by Kunal Kumar with supporting roles played by Marathi theatre and film veterans, Pradeep Patwardhan and Jaywanth Wadekar. Background score is to be given by Anurag Saikia, the national award winner for the music of Yugadrashta in 2014. The camerawork is done by Pushpank Gawade who won the best award for Cinematography for the film Kaalo in South Africa film festival 2012.

programme.title: Humari Khushboo
programme.desc: Khushboo a beautiful, young smart girl of 24 years has a medical condition that is associated with a social taboo, and her confidence is shattered when she ruins a Project Presentation in front of a prestigious and renowned client in her office. How she regains her lost confidence and fights against a social taboo, is the sort of stance HUMARI KHUSHBOO will take.

programme.title: Wazir
programme.desc: A crime thriller that showcases the tale of an impeccably executed murder, where the culprits cleverly evade justice through meticulous planning and a lack of incriminating evidence.

programme.title: Blowback
programme.desc: An anxious boy is confused if marijuana helps him with his issues. His quest to answer this dilemma leads him into a night full of corruption and deceit.

programme.title: Bandage
programme.desc: A young-adult, aspiring boxer, Aditya, trains with his father to become the best. However, he starts questioning his ambition and skills to make it to the top. Battling with his own troubles, the father tries to motivate Aditya. Will the father-son duo emerge victoriously, or will they crumble down in the face of their adversities?

programme.title: Agarbatti
programme.desc: Bhola, who is mentally challenged but still manages to survive by himself, selling incense sticks on the roads. An accident takes place near bhola, he doesnât see the person clearly who is driving the car. Will he be able to tell the police about this incident?

programme.title: An Astrologer's Day
programme.desc: Based on a short story by R.K. Narayan from Malgudi Days. A normal day in the life of an astrologer reveals a lot about him.

programme.title: Epicfail
programme.desc: It is difficult to understand the truth about Ramayana in todayâs time as it gets lost in translation. This is a film about a young and passionate journalist discovering the truth about Sita.

programme.title: Goals
programme.desc: As Meera, our pretty in pink protagonist comes back to Bombay after spending several months apart from her beau Ranbir, the circumstances force them to evaluate the basis of their relationship. This film is a deep dive into a young adult's core problems of emotional dishonesty and preference of style over substance.

programme.title: Mentoo
programme.desc: A director is accused by an upcoming actress of harassing her and asking her to sleep with him and he would cast her in his next film, these allegations literally destroy his career, but are all allegations always true?

programme.title: A Situation
programme.desc: A widower father, Pradeep has adapted to the challenging life of raising a daughter single-handedly after demise of his wife. One fine morning, she undergoes menstrual bleeding while taking a bath. Helpless and terrified she is locked inside the bathroom, not answering her father. He does not understand what to do next. This film shows that even today, periods stand as the biggest question to a lot of parents.

programme.title: Barat
programme.desc: A Typical miser starts picking up a mysterious trail of money only to find out something unearthly lurking around!

programme.title: A Tale Of An Onion Witch Chapter 2
programme.desc: One year after the mysterious events of part 1, a newly married couple comes across a lady who claims to be Mangla. They are warned about the 150-year-old Witch that wanders around at night asking for an Onion. Things go haywire when a small girl knocks for help at midnight.

programme.title: Half Cake
programme.desc: HALF CAKE is about a single mother who struggles to earn extra wages to fulfil an innocent ask of a cake from her only son. Beyond the cake, it's a tale of innocence and resilience that will touch your heart.

programme.title: Harshit
programme.desc: This film is inspired by Shakespeare's Hamlet, written by Dhruva Harsh. It contains all the Shakespearean elements like, betrayal, love, hatred, revenge, sexual jealousy, poetic justice and dilemma of existence. Harshit is a protagonist synonymous to Hamlet, a Hindu boy living in a Muslim dominated area in Mumbai, India, loves Rahila, his neighbour. Later on fate plays a game in which two innocents, Harshit n Rahila are trapped.

programme.title: Love Ishtory
programme.desc: Chhavi belongs to a Brahmin family. She loves Aakash who is from a backward caste. Chhaviâs father is very disappointed with her daughterâs decision. Her father orders local inspector Dubey to catch Aakash to rough him up. But Chhaviâs elder brother Vicky appears in between. Vickyâs intention seems as he will blow Aakashâs head off. But there is a twist in the tale.

programme.title: Ludo
programme.desc: Two girls accidentally find out that in addition to the man they unknowingly share, they also share a lot of gifts from him. Including a game of Ludo which resembles their lives in some manner.

programme.title: Pilibhit
programme.desc: Inspired by true stories, Siraj, a righteous, impoverished flute maker, resides at the edge of the forests of Pilibhit, North India, where man-eating tigers thrive. His mounting livelihood pressures and tragedies corner him to take a drastic measure that threatens to tear down his values and a loved one.

programme.title: Arundeep Singh
programme.desc: A man with a speech disorder who even struggles to do his day to day activities will face his greatest fear of dating a woman.

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk
programme.desc: Dawn to Dusk tells the narrative of Nisha Rawat, a young girl who lost her parents. She has skin cancer, Malignant Melanoma and her entire life revolves around the night. Nisha accepted her circumstances as they were. Her life, however, is turned upside down when she meets Suraj, a boy who works at a hospital. Dawn to Dusk becomes Nisha and Suraj's narrative.

programme.title: Doughnut
programme.desc: Sameer, on his afternoon break from work, walks into a restaurant hoping for some quiet time. However, a doughnut with supposedly magical properties has him in for a shock. Fearing the unreal powers he suddenly acquires, he hurries out. How does a young woman who walks in right then change Sameer's attitude towards the magical doughnut?

programme.title: 10.30 Lets Go To School
programme.desc: Disha is an ordinary village girl with dreams like any other kid. Not only does she love her father unconditionally, but also her books and school. Life takes an unexpected turn when her Baba and Bua decide to discontinue their education. Her fate is about to meet that of thousands of other children who drop out of school every year. However, it is not so easy to give up. She is intelligent, confident and above all, determined to get back what she rightfully deserves, her right to dream!

programme.title: Kamera
programme.desc: He is a 12 years old boy, who works in a garbage dump and lives in the slum along with his mother. Both have different ideologies towards life. He is a staunch believer of being positive and has a dream of spreading smiles. But, his mother is a frustrated woman. While working, he finds a digital camera in the dump. His friend tells him that people smile whenever you point it towards them. He soon realizes the same and gets all thrilled to spread smiles including his mother. Unfortunately, the camera gets lost and all his dreams get shattered. What happens next is the core of the film. The story revolves around the perception of a small kid who wants to follow his dreams.

programme.title: The Apple
programme.desc: Story of two kids and how their life coincides whilst exchanging an Apple. The story reflects the societal dichotomy under the same sky in a small town near Delhi. The film is Accredited in the British Council Global Film directory and quoted by BBC as an "absolutely brilliant thought-provoking film.

programme.title: Dum Dum Deega Deega
programme.desc: The solution to your problem is often hidden in the problem itself; all you need is a different outlook. The story of a beggar child, Ajju, who lives on the streets of Mumbai, but dreams big. He challenges his unfortunate fate, with nothing but a 'different outlook' towards the situation he faces.

programme.title: Kissss
programme.desc: Joy and Ichcha elope from their respective houses as their parents are against them getting married. They take shelter at Joy's friend, Mihir's place. Mihir, who meets Ichcha for the first time is enchanted with her beauty. He is wondering why the families are against such a wonderful pair. Watch to find out the secret behind.

programme.title: Make Her Happy
programme.desc: Nandita and Rahul are to be married soon. They are a live-in couple. Things take a U-turn when Rahul gets a call from his ex-girlfriend 'Suhana'. Will Rahul be able to save himself? Watch to find out who has trapped whom.

programme.title: Be Khush
programme.desc: Be Khush' is a satire and commentary on commercialism and the society we live in. In a dystopian world, where happiness is scarce and nobody is happy, comes 'Be Khush'. A pill which can provide you happiness on any occasion. But what happens, when someone starts giving away happiness for free?

programme.title: Cheater
programme.desc: Love is blind, they say. And, sometimes, quite literally! How many of us are guilty of forgiving our partners once too often for their hurtful actions? When it comes to a cheating spouse, however, you would think there was no scope for forgiveness.

programme.title: Aakhri Kahani
programme.desc: A struggling writer decides that he's going to make one last effort to pitch his idea to a film producer. He gets the chance to do so in an unusual way when he turns out to be driving a cab that the producer has hired.

programme.title: Abba Ki Chaddi
programme.desc: in Small town where she lives.. Whose husband used to bother her a lot and was responsible for everything, One day suddenly her husband starts fearing her in the name of his father's stick.she does not like his words,makes

programme.title: ABC
programme.desc: For some people life is about triumph against all odds, for some; life is only about complexities. Some walk through this road aimlessly and some; actually become the bridge. ABC is a short film that showcases the dichotomy between two extreme yet simple individuals. It is an empowering film which has the dexterity & optimism to resonate amongst all sections of audience. As humans, we do tend to forget that we are but one world than just mere economy, that it can just take one human, just one moment, just one action to turn around the paths of millions. ABC; is just a sweet gentle reminder of this thought.

programme.title: Baalak
programme.desc: A film about a girl moving to Kolkata for her new job. She chooses a hotel for overnight stay where an incident makes her realize that life revolves in a circle and carries her emotionally very close to her home and family.

programme.title: Gutargu
programme.desc: Gutargu is a romantic Hindi short story about a guy a girl who admire each other, and are falling for each other secretly. Their unusual love story takes place on a rooftop. Will their love story have a happy ending?

programme.title: Hack-her
programme.desc: Shraddha, about to leave for America through a Corporate that is currently under attack by a hacker, who is on run by the police and is currently on every news channel. Between all this is Vishesh, who truly loves Shraddha, and now even she is going, just like his parents, leaving him all alone. But not everything we see is true, a hacker on a mission, a girl with ambitions, and a lover, sounds good right? But who is who? Do we know the entire truth? Find out everything in our upcoming short film "Hack-Her"

programme.title: In Your Arms
programme.desc: Payal and Nikhil have been married for 14 years, have lived happily and celebrated all the important occasions together. But now, sitting at the breakfast table, Nikhil breaks his silence, tells Payal that he does not want to drag this relation any further since there is no love left in their relationship. He confesses that he is in love with his colleague and they should get a divorce. Payal tells him that she will give him divorce but she has conditions which need to be fulfilled. Will Nikhil agree to it? What is the condition? Watch this awesome romantic short film to find out.

programme.title: Love, Bites
programme.desc: Love, bites is a romantic drama where the story revolves around the lives of Karthik, an artist, and Meghna, scientist. Their sexual chemistry is obvious to everyone. Even to those who havenât seen them together, since they like to flaunt the hickeys on their body. But something changes in their equation when the hickey becomes a bridge of memory that leads to an old sexual encounter Meghna had which Karthik finds out about. Will Meghna be able to help Karthik erase the marks of her past? Or will Karthik just to have to wake up to a realization that the past, even though it haunts, might not be real.

programme.title: Panch Din
programme.desc: A Married couple meets in a cafe to take divorce but coincidentally their common friend meets them and reminds them of something which might make a shift to their minds.

programme.title: Thanks Mom
programme.desc: Thanks Mom is a human & a universal story of every mother & son that will melt your hearts away. The film's strength is its emotional value and connectivity to the viewers. It is the most honest & truest form of interpretation of a mother's role. It highlights a mom-son connection that is frayed and rough around the edges, filled with awkward silences and unsaid feelings that both find difficult to navigate but come around for each other when the time comes.

programme.title: Abnormal
programme.desc: This is the tale of a mother who grapples with societal challenges due to her transgender son. She confronts opposition from her family and the broader community, yet resolves to safeguard her child's future. Eventually, she triumphs in establishing their identity within society.

programme.title: Believer
programme.desc: The story revolves around a young man who is struggling with his career and has to face tough situations on the financial front. In a state of dejection/ despair he has a dialogue with his inner self. His negative self talks him into addictions and resorting to drugs or committin suicide (escapist attitude) He usually feels at home in the company of his negative self and seeks solace here. Yet somewhere he is dissatisfied and constantly looking for his positive self, whom he has only abandoned

programme.title: Arjun
programme.desc: Arjun is a soldier who works more like a mercenary in a never-ending war. He willfully follows the brutal orders of his commanding officer until one day, his entire world turns upside down. Examining one soldier's journey toward redemption, we show that our shared humanity is always worth fighting for underneath the trappings of all that divides us.

programme.title: Bumbhaiyya
programme.desc: The movie shows that how a common man is affected by the inter-religious conflicts that happen and how in the end he understands the real truth.

programme.title: Freedom
programme.desc: Freedom is based on the lives of three women. All of them are going through the difficult challenges, which is made by society and their own family members. Despite living in democratic society lots of women still do not have permission to follow their passion or choose their carrier.

programme.title: Just Take It Easy
programme.desc: The story is basically on internal happiness. Sanjay a businessman is the CEO of Oberoi Industries. He is not happy in his life. Despite having all the materialistic pleasure not happy internally. The company celebrates its success party on its high growth. Sanjay invites a model Priyanka, his girlfriend to the party. He promises her to make the face of Oberoi Industries.

programme.title: Mingi
programme.desc: In Malaysia, Mingi and Elisa, a couple, face a challenging twist in their lives. Mingi, born blind and grappling with amnesia, travels to India for a brief visit. Tragically, during his absence, Elisa dies. The narrative introduces a doctor who believes the killer is a figment of Mingi's imagination, adding a psychological dimension to the story

programme.title: Foul
programme.desc: Against the setting of a journey to Thailand, Ayush, a lustful businessman, possesses both the capability and cleverness to be unfaithful to his wife and shatter her aspirations of moving to Canada. Yet, the question remains: Can he thwart her pursuit of realizing her dreams?

programme.title: Lock-Up
programme.desc: Inspector Maya Verma Has Just Arrested A Young Girl From The Red Light District. Kanchan Is Defiant And Unaffected, At First. A Conversation Between Them Leads To An Interesting Revelation. A Twisted Night With A Twisted End.

programme.title: Dubki
programme.desc: Dubki is a story based on a true incident of a female constable in male-dominated law enforcement. Despite being a tough and dominant constable at the Lalkurti police station, Ganga Yadav was troubled several times by SHO Durgesh Mishra. Ganga complained about it to the IPS officer and asked for a transfer; however, he refused to help her. The female constable was left with no other choice but to take justice into her own hands.

programme.title: Dwand
programme.desc: Ruby, a lower-middle-class girl was made to believe that she is beautiful, intelligent, and different and that she deserves a worthy husband. She completed her studies and wanted to be a career girl. However, the marriage happened contrary to her expectations with a traditional man Vivek of the similar lower middle-class strata. After giving birth to a girl child she revolted and joined an advertising company to shape up her career. Here begins the nightmare.

programme.title: Late Night Taxi
programme.desc: All the fears of a girl come to life after she travels in a late-night taxi she had booked. Does she reach home safely?

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In Office
programme.desc: A young woman is feeling uncomfortable around older male colleagues who are treating her unfairly. She seeks help from HR but does not receive the support she needs. She wonders why she is always the one being blamed and considers ways to address the situation and overcome it

programme.title: Threes A Couple
programme.desc: 3 Lives Change after they cross each other's path on one auspicious night.

programme.title: Prowl
programme.desc: A young girl pays a visit to a mysterious stranger after connecting with him through a dating site. What follows is either a cautionary tale or a parable, based on how you view it.

programme.title: Baggage

programme.title: Lawless
